pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Decentriq - Python SDKThe Decentriq Python SDK exposes the [Decentriq platform](platform.decentriq.com)'s functionality via easy-to-use programming constructs and, as such, allowsusers to interact with the platform in a programmatic way.Releases of this library are hosted on [https://pypi.org/project/decentriq-platform/](pypi) and can be installed via the Python package manager `pip`.Please refer to the [official documentation](https://docs.decentriq.com/python) for tutorials on how to install and use theDecentriq Python SDK, as well as for detailed API documentation.
